## **Welcome** {data-progressive=FALSE}
Welcome to the interactive course "Introduction to Evidence Synthesis in Biomedical Research'' of the Institute for Medical Biometry, Epidemiology and Medical Informatics, Saarland University.

#### **Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs)**  
**What is the objective of the course?**  
This interactive course aims to provide state-of-the-art information and recommendations concerning meta-analysis of aggregated data from conceptually similar studies in biomedical research.
<br>

**How long is the course?**  
While individual timing may vary, this course takes on average approximately 2 hours.
<br>

**Are there any prerequisites for the course?**  
The course assumes no prior knowledge of meta-analytic techniques.
<br>

**Which software is required for the course?**  
R (https://www.r-project.org) and R Studio (https://www.rstudio.com)
